content.content: Morgan Bialkowski has been building a name for herself as a talented contemporary artist in Rossland, capturing the region's landscapes and wildlife in her vibrant acrylic paintings. Pixel Mountain Creative were excited to work with her on a full redesign of her existing online store, creating a website that serves as both a professional portfolio and a seamless e-commerce platform for selling her artwork.
v1743126333/BialkowskiGalleryMockup_f4sb6w.mp4

This project encompassed a complete overhaul of the site's design and functionality, including streamlined e-commerce integration to simplify the purchasing process for customers. We provided photography and videography to showcase Morgan's work in the best light, along with all the necessary digital assets to maintain a cohesive and visually compelling online presence. Since launch, the website has enhanced Morgan's ability to connect with her audience, making it easier than ever for collectors to explore and purchase her art.

Jonny and Tyler have quickly turned B&T's Hard Knock Cafe into one of the most popular venues in Rossland, and serve the town up some exceptional food, music, and great times. Pixel Mountain Creative were thrilled to work with them to create a website that reflects the Hard Rock Cafe's unique vibe and showcases their menu and events in a fun, engaging way.
v1743125398/HardKnockMockup_dmygps.mp4

This project encompassed end-to-end services including photography and image editing, web development, and deployment, and we were able to build on the outstanding branding and design work Kickstart Customs in Rossland had already done with B&T's to create design assets optimised for use on the web. The website grew quickly in the first few weeks after launch to thousands of weekly pageviews, and Pixel Mountain were able to provide ongoing support to help Jonny and Tyler manage their online presence and keep their customers engaged, which saw a direct increase in revenue and event attendance.

For this Osteopathy business in Rossland, BC, Pixel Mountain delivered a sleek, high-performance landing page that integrates seamlessly with the client's existing booking system, JaneApp. We used vanilla CSS and JavaScript to create smooth animations and interactivity, ensuring a custom feel while keeping the site lightweight and fast. The site features a contact form and an embedded Google Maps API to make it easy for potential clients to find the business. Google Analytics integration enables data-driven insights to optimize performance over time.
v1729739660/RootedInMotionMockupLaptop_cpyjkl.jpg

This project encompassed end-to-end services, including photography and image editing, web development, and deployment. We collaborated with designer Sean Makura to bring this vision to life, blending function with aesthetic to create a streamlined, user-friendly experience for both the business and its clients.

While not the typical outdoor sports and event photography that Pixel Mountain is known for, we were thrilled to step out of our comfort zone to capture Joe and Jana’s intimate elopement at Chemo Cabin in the mountains above Rossland, BC. Surrounded by close family, their ceremony was set against the breathtaking natural beauty of the Rossland Range in the early fall, making for a truly memorable day.

We documented not only the key moments but also the small, candid interactions that made their day unique. The stunning backdrop, combined with the couple’s genuine happiness, allowed us to create a collection of images that captured the heart of their celebration.
We wish Joe and Jana all the best in their future together and are grateful for the opportunity to step beyond our usual work to help tell their story.

Secret Spots is a web app built with SvelteKit and Firebase that allows users to keep a personal logbook of their favourite locations with a maps API, and record descriptions and notes of various visits to the location. The app was built by the Pixel Mountain team to showcase some more advanced features available for client projects, suchs as user authentication, database integration, and API usage.

Secret Spots is a full-stack project conceptualised and realised end-to-end by the Pixel Mountain team, from design to deployment. The app is built with a responsive design that works on all devices, and features a clean, intuitive user interface built from the ground up that makes it easy for users to add, edit, and delete locations and visits. The app also includes a search feature that allows users to quickly find locations by name or description. Users can customise their experience through a settings page that allows them to change their name, email, and password.
Pixel Mountain is proud to present Secret Spots as an example of the high-quality, custom web applications we can build for clients looking to take their online presence to the next level.

The Pixel Mountain team were on-site to capture the excitement of the 2023 Tree Hugger Hare Scramble, an annual off-road motorcycle enduro event held at Kootenay Motocross Track. The event featured riders of all ages and skill levels, from beginners to seasoned pros, competing in a hare scramble style race over the course of two days in September 2023.
v1729123615/DSC07353_fixacn.jpg

We provided full event coverage, capturing the action from multiple vantage points around the track, as well as candid shots of riders and spectators. Our team worked closely with event organizers to ensure we captured all the key moments, from the start line to the podium celebrations. The resulting images were used for promotional materials, social media, and press releases to help grow the event's profile and attract new participants in following years.
